selected_quotes: DOPPS finds more activity linked to better HRQOL, less depression lower mortality #WorldKidneyDay #move4kidneys
#PhysicalActivity may reduce #depression improve QoL in #hemodialysis pts. Do you suggest PA for your HD pts?

citation.abstract: Physical activity has been associated with better health status in diverse populations, but the association in patients on maintenance hemodialysis is less established. Patient-reported physical activities and associations with mortality, health-related quality of life, and depression symptoms in patients on maintenance hemodialysis in 12 countries were examined.
citation.journal: Clinical Journal of The American Society of Nephrology
citation.title: Associations of Self-Reported Physical Activity Types and Levels with Quality of Life, Depression Symptoms, and Mortality in Hemodialysis Patients: The DOPPS

news.summary: Physical activity improves overall quality of life, reduces depressive symptoms and cuts down the premature death risk in patients with kidney failure who are on dialysis, a new study shows.
